lom:description.lom:string: Uppsala University's Earth Science Department's website contains nice explanations of advanced research being conducted at the university. Could be useful for showing students interested in geology what can be done with a geo education.

Departmental home page on Earth Sciences. Sections included are Research, seminars, chairs, education, among others. Especially useful is the research page, which explains research being conducted in the various departments within Earth Sciences.

lom:keyword.lom:string: Earth Sciences, geoinformatics, geodynamics, geophysics, hydrology, meteorology, mineral chemistry, sedimentology, seismology

lom:title.lom:string: Department of Earth Sciences, Uppsala University
